item.title: Suspect named after car ramming in Vancouver kills 11
item.description: Kai-Ji Adam Lo, a 30-year-old resident of the city, is charged with several counts of second degree murder.

item.title: Trump 'thinks' Zelensky ready to give up Crimea to Russia
item.description: The latest comments by the US president come despite Kyiv repeatedly rejecting ceding the peninsula.

item.title: How Armenia is trying to build a Silicon Valley in the Caucasus
item.description: The country is aiming to boost its technology sector by training children in tech from a young age.

item.title: South Africa will defend sovereignty, ANC chair says as tensions with US grow
item.description: The ANC chair's comments come after months of US tension over race relations and land law.

item.title: Beijing seizes tiny sandbank in South China Sea
item.description: The Philippines, which disputes China's claim to the sandbank, responds by releasing a photo of its own forces on another.
